Articles.Content:
Since this new update I've noticed several issues I've been having and not sure if they are issues with mods or the game itself.

1)Issue with warp when warping at high speeds, instead of the ship falling into a planets orbit on a return trip from a moon it just goes in some random direction after the moon's escape point.

2)Planting a flag wont pop up with a window to put stuff on the plaque and I can't move the Kerbal that planted it till I go to the space center and back to the Kerbal.

3)Having issues with contracts not completing like they should. I can't complete "achieve orbit around minmus" even though I have several times and issues with orbit height not regestering when trying to complete contracts.

There's probably a few more, these are just ones that I've been having regular issues with.
